title: OMG RADS ERROR?!?!
body:
Yesterday I started getting the rads error when i opened my league. I restarted my computer and everything but it still keeps saying 'Could not connect to HTTP server...'. Its been 2 days now and im just here to ask if this is TPGs problem or riots fault. 


Thanks, xmehsonx.

replies.body:
Might be TPG, they don't have the best reputation. But, you shouldn't just give up right away. Have you tried restarting your modem?

Have you tried [changing your DNS to Google's one](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq4) to see if that works?
